casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Bernard Nathaniel HADDER. No. 548P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 4, 2003. Bernard N. Hadder, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Onslow County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of December 2003."
